tika-abh08t46:2_1: Idāni ñāṇadassanavisuddhiyā niddese anuppatte sā yassa ñāṇassa anantaraṁ uppajjati,
tika-abh08t46:2_4: Āvajjaniyaṭhānattāti āvajjanakiccaṁ karontaṁ kiriyamanodhātu viya maggassa āvajjanaṭṭhāne ṭhitattā abbohārikameva ubhayavisuddhilakkhaṇābhāvato.
tika-abh08t46:2_6: tathāpi vuṭṭhānagāminivipassanāya pariyosānattā vipassanāpakkhiyamevāti āha “vipassanāya sotasmiṁ,
tika-abh08t46:3_2: tadeva gottaṁ ariyehi asammissā puthujjanasamaññāti pothujjanikagottaṁ.
tika-abh08t46:3_10: Tato bhavatīti tato gottato ārammaṇapaccayato bhavati.
tika-abh08t46:4_2: Taṁ sampādetuṁ panicchatā tena bhikkhunā yaṁ aññaṁ kiñcipi kātabbaṁ,
tika-abh08t46:4_5: “Katamevā”ti vutte “katha”nti anuyogassa upaṭṭhitattā “anulomāvasānaṁ hī”tiādinā taṁ samattheti.
tika-abh08t46:5_1: Evaṁ uppannaanulomañāṇassa panassa etehi tīhipi anulomañāṇehi attano balānurūpena thūlathūle saccapaṭicchādakatamamhi
tika-abh08t46:5_5: sabbaṁ nimittārammaṇampi sabbaṁ pavattārammaṇampi palibodhato upaṭṭhāti,
tika-abh08t46:5_6: athassa sabbasmiṁ nimittappavattārammaṇe palibodhato upaṭṭhite dutiyassa vā tatiyassa vā anulomañāṇassa anantaraṁ gotrabhuñāṇaṁ uppajjati.
tika-abh08t46:6_2: Ekantikatāya ekavārameva ca uppajjanato punarāvattābhāvena pana anāvattaṁ.
tika-abh08t46:6_4: Saññaṁ datvā viyāti “evaṁ uppajjāhī”ti saññaṁ datvā viya.
tika-abh08t46:6_9: eko kira issāso aṭṭhausabhamatte padese phalakasataṁ ṭhapāpetvā vatthena mukhaṁ veṭhetvā saraṁ sannayhitvā cakkayante aṭṭhāsi,
tika-abh08t46:6_10: añño puriso cakkayantaṁ āvijjhitvā yadā issāsassa phalakaṁ abhimukhaṁ hoti,
tika-abh08t46:6_12: Issāso daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva saraṁ khipitvā phalakasatanibbijjhati.
tika-abh08t46:6_15: daṇḍakasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva phalakasataṁ nibbijjhanaṁ viya maggañāṇassa gotrabhuñāṇena dinnasaññaṁ amuñcitvāva
tika-abh08t46:6_16: nibbānaṁ ārammaṇaṁ katvā anibbiddhapubbānaṁ apadālitapubbānaṁ lobhadosamohakkhandhānaṁ nibbijjhananti.
tika-abh08t46:7_1: mahodadhinti aṭṭhamabhavato paṭṭhāya nibbattakaṁ aññātakoṭiṁ saṁsāravaṭṭadukkhamahāsamuddaṁ.
tika-abh08t46:7_2: Pāṇātipātādipañcaverāni ceva pañcavīsati mahābhayāni cāti sabbaverabhayāni.
tika-abh08t46:9_0: 1340-3.“Ajānitvāvadanti te”ti vatvā tattha kāraṇaṁ dassetuṁ “ekassā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
tika-abh08t46:9_1: Pañcamaṁ maggacittanti imināva chaṭṭhassa abhāvadīpanena “ekaṁ phalacitta”nti vadato godattattherassa vādopi paṭikkhitto.
tika-abh08t46:10_1: Sotāpannoti vuccatīti sotāpanno nāma dutiyo ariyapuggaloti vuccati.
tika-abh08t46:10_2: So devarajjacakkavattirajjādipamādaṭṭhānaṁ āgamma bhusaṁ pamattopi hutvā kāmasugatiyaṁ sattakkhattumeva
tika-abh08t46:13_0: Rūpārūpalokesu pana na tathā niyamoti ācariyā.
tika-abh08t46:14_1: Tathā ca “iminā vatāhaṁ maggena āgato”ti paṭhamaṁ maggaṁ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t46:14_2: tato “ayaṁ me ānisaṁso laddho”ti phalaṁ paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t46:14_3: tato “ime nāma me kilesā pahīnā”ti pahīnakilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t46:14_4: tato “ime nāma me kilesā avasiṭṭhā”ti uparimaggattayavajjhe kilese paccavekkhati,
tika-abh08t46:14_5: avasāne “ayaṁ me dhammo ārammaṇato paṭividdho”ti amataṁ nibbānaṁ paccavekkhati.
tika-abh08t46:15_4: Pahīnāvasiṭṭhakilesapaccavekkhaṇañhi sekhānampi hoti vā na vā.
tika-abh08t46:15_5: Na hi sabbeva tattha samatthā honti.
tika-abh08t46:15_6: Teneva hi mahānāmo bhagavantaṁ pucchi “ko su nāma me dhammo ajjhattaṁ appahīno,
tika-abh08t46:15_7: yena me ekadā lobhadhammāpi cittaṁ pariyādāya tiṭṭhantī”tiādi.
tika-abh08t46:15_9: aparena vā samayena kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvakarāya sakadāgāmimaggasaṅkhātāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā adhigamatthāya vipassanāyogaṁ karoti,
tika-abh08t46:15_12: Sampayuttānaṁ pana nissayabhāvena te dhammā bhavanti etthāti bhūmi,
tika-abh08t46:15_13: yasmā vā samānepi lokuttarabhāve sayampi bhavati,
tika-abh08t46:15_16: Ñāṇena parimajjatīti tena tenākārena indriyānaṁ tikkhatarataṁ sampādetvā,
tika-abh08t46:15_17: balabojjhaṅgānañca paṭutarabhāvaṁ sādhetvā lakkhaṇattayaṁ tīraṇavasena parimajjati.
tika-abh08t46:16_4: Gotrabhussa anantaranti ettha gotrabhu viya gotrabhu.
tika-abh08t46:16_11: Yasmā pana paṭisambhidāmagge “uppādādiabhibhavanaṭṭhaṁ upādāya aṭṭha gotrabhudhammā samādhivasena uppajjanti,
tika-abh08t46:16_12: dasa gotrabhudhammā vipassanāvasena uppajjantī”tiādīsu gotrabhunāmavaseneva āgataṁ,
tika-abh08t46:16_13: tasmā idhāpi “gotrabhussa anantara”nti vuttaṁ gottasaṅkhātanibbānato bhūtanti katvā.
tika-abh08t46:17_2: Imaṁ lokaṁ āgantvāti iminā pañcasu sakadāgāmīsu cattāro vajjetvā ekova gahito.
tika-abh08t46:17_3: Ekacco hi idha sakadāgāmiphalaṁ patvā idheva parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t46:17_6: ekacco devaloke patvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyatīti ime cattāropi idha na gahitā.
tika-abh08t46:17_7: Yo pana idha patvā devaloke yāvatāyukaṁ vasitvā idhūpapajjitvā parinibbāyati,
tika-abh08t46:17_10: bhave vā antakaro bhavassa antakaroti attho.
tika-abh08t46:17_12: Byāpādakāmarāgānaṁpahānāyāti tesaṁyeva sakadāgāmimaggena tanukarānaṁ saṁyojanānaṁ niravasesappahānāya.
tika-abh08t46:18_3: Tatthevāti suddhāvāse vā aññattha vā yattha uppanno,
tika-abh08t46:18_5: Anāvattisabhāvoti tasmā lokā idha paṭisandhiggahaṇavasena imaṁ lokaṁ punarāgamanābhāvato anāvattanasabhāvo,
tika-abh08t46:19_8: attano paramatthaṭṭhena ca attano atthattā “sadattho”ti vuccati.
tika-abh08t46:19_11: Catassopīti sotāpattimaggo sakadāgāmimaggo anāgāmimaggo arahattamaggoti catassopi.
